reviewText: I have watched this show for a few years now, and I feel that the actors should be commended for their portrayal of the FBI Bau unit. Even though the show is sometimes violent.  It shows what can happen in real life.  Very well done.

It got here quickly and was great until I got to season 5. I opened the case and there were no disks. When I contacted Amazon, I was told that they couldn't just send me the season that I was missing. Instead I had to return all 8 seasons and wait for them to send me a replacement.

My package was not fully closed and most of the cases to my dvds where broken. I wish i knew that i would be spending so much money on something that wouldn't be brand new like i ordered.. Very upset about it will not order anything like this again.. would like to know how to send them back and get my money back

Never saw Criminal Minds in first run, caught a few episodes on Ion and enjoyed them so I decided to investigate.  I bought the 8-season pack (heck of a deal - better than each season individually) and am half-way into the first season.  I remember hearing how Mandy Patinkin said this series was a horrible experience for him because of the subject matter and I can see how deeply it affected him by the intensity in his performances.

I would definitely recommend to anyone with an interest in psychology and/or procedurals.

Criminal Minds is a great show I recommend it to anyone to buy the seasons together, it's much cheaper than buying them separate. They shipped fast and I got it a day after it shipped which was awesome. Yet some of the discs look scratched, I hope they all work I don't think I'll have a problem with it. Also three of the cases are damaged they almost look used. Those are the only reasons I said it was simply okay.

I actually got the 7 season pack last year and then got season 8 for Christmas, but I'm just reviewing this because it's easier. It's the best show and right now it's half off, which is an absolutely amazing price!
I love everything Criminal Minds. Have seen every episode several times and always see something new, interesting and exciting. Love it.
Is a gift

I still miss Mandy Potinkin as the head of the group, and it took me a long time to get used to Joe Montegna. But the whole surrounding cast and the great writers for the series make it too good to pass up.
Been a great show since day one. Solid story lines each and every season. I bought the eight season pack for my niece as a birthday present although I've watch all the seasons over the years.
Great series!

Received the entire collection for Christmas 2013. I can't wait to add the year 2014 to the collection. There's a couple of cuties, a couple of smart ones, a couple of pretty ones and a couple of family men who have it all...or do they???
Perfect
Criminal minds - FBI pro filers that solve murders (serial killers) mostly. The characters have their own issue and life stories through the series and it is a great show.

This series, I believe will be the gold standard by which other police drama dramas will be judged. Great cast, great chemistry, you can watch any show multiple times and still enjoy and appreciate the story.

I love the intelligence and mystery of the show. Yes, you can figure out who did it before the team at times due to seeing what they can't, but it's interesting to see how they get to some of the conclusions they do.

Purchased this series set(1-8) as a birthday gift.  This is my friend's favorite TV program.  She works the pm shift so she only saw a hit and miss show.  So now she has the whole thing through season eight.  Season 9 will be the only season missing in her collection. I purchased this through a weekly sale.
I love watching Criminal Minds.  I could work for the BAU with all the shows I've watched.  I never get tires of watching. :o)
Enjoyed watching Seasons 1-8. I was able to catch up on the episodes that I've missed.  Can't wait to get Season 9.
This is a wonderful series and would recommend it to anyone who likes crime stories the actors are fantastic and storylines the same
As my wife and I are watching we couldn't believe how many episodes they never play on tv. If you just watch criminal minds on TV than you are missing out.
This is one of my favorite TV series.  I love the thrills and the plot twists.  Actors are excellent!  Good thing to own.
I have been so happy with my 8 seasons. Wish there were bigger season packages. Thank you for everything being on time and working great.
The dvds were in perfect condition and all of them were there. I would recommend anyone to buy this set.
I bought this Pack for my husband for his birthday. He loves it because everything thru season 8 is there together and it saved us money by buying it like this!
It got here on time and in good shape. This was a good item to add to my library of movies.

I love this show and this was a great deal for the first 8 seasons.  My only complaint was the way it was all shrink-wrapped together and a couple of the season boxes were damaged.  When I contacted Amazon about it, they were happy to replace, but it would have to be the entire package, and I could easily see them arriving damaged again.  So a great deal, just be aware if you're a collector and care about condition.
Excellent product :) love criminal minds I would reccommend it to anyone. The cd quality is great so far !

It has been great to watch the entire 8 seasons of Criminal Minds again, especially the odd episode here and there that I had missed when watching it on TV. I actually watch a lot of British drama, Spooks being a favourite, and yet I became addicted to Criminal Minds I think because of the wonderful and quirky personalities of the characters, if only people bonded like this at work in real life :) I enjoy both fiction and non-fiction when it comes to anything criminal; profiling, investigation and forensics. As a fictional series this one is light and fun, and yet very creepy at the same time :/ The acting is perfect for the parts each are playing. Loved it!

Amazon shipped my package super fast and I am so thankful that I could receive it in Australia. Thank you.
It arrived on time. I love the series. It was a great price. I only had one small mishap but it was settled well.
Love criminal minds so happy I found a pack for a good price. Happy it was deliveried fast I've almost watched all the seasons.

We love "Criminal Minds", and were extremely glad to have all 8 seasons at one time!!  And we will continue to buy each new season as it becomes available.  Your price was reasonable and we are really enjoying them.  Thanks, Pamela C.
Besides being hooked on this series. The dvd's are impeccable with no malfunctions whatsoever. I would give this seller very high review.
I have been watching reruns on Monday's only and now get to watch several nights a week.  Have seen 2 glitches in recording of 1st season,  hoping thats the worst of issues and not a bad disc.
it was a valentines day present for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it because its his favorite show thanks

This is a review for the show (first 8 seasons itself).  I have only purchased season seven and eight off of Amazon, I already had the first six. The only thing about the DVD's/packaging of the individual seasons themselves is that all but two of them are in a cardboard box and are in the slim cases, this is in my opinion a cheap and crappy way of packaging expensive seasons, but not the worst way, nonetheless, it was not even consistent with two of the other seasons, 5 & 6 are in the great regular plastic cases, then it went back to the slim cases in the cardboard box.

Now my review for the show:
Criminal Minds is by far the greatest TV show of its kind, no crime show whether it be a Law & Order, CSI, Monk, Castle, or whatever, have been so gutsy, so investing, so brilliantly astonishing in every way! Ever since I saw one episode on TV I was hooked! But after missing an episode here and there it became hard to keep track so I tried to rent them (never do this) and one disk was missing so I went a few years not watching the show, then my mother and I started buying the seasons to get through the winter, we started them long before winter and finished them before too! This show was so engaging, I love the characters, the plots, murders, murders or whatever crimes they have, I have never been so invested in such a show, I wish season 9 would be released already!!!!! I HIGHLY recommend this show, my favorite character is Dr. Spencer Reid. I have yet to see a bad season and hope it ends before that happens. Truly an amazing masterpiece of a show!

Violent Content: 9/10 - Strong Graphic Violence and Bloody Violence, Gore, Murders, Terrorism, Strong Graphic Sadistic Physical, Mental, and Emotional Torture, Disturbing Graphic and Bloody/Gory Imagery, Cannibalism, Psycho Sexual Violence and Assaults, Suicide, Terrorism, Drug Use, Car Wrecks, Threats.

Sexuality/Nudity: 7/10 - Some Strong Dialog and Descriptions of Sexual Activities Including Rape, Cruel Sexual Torture and Humiliation Suggestive Pedophilia and Other Disturbing Material Against Children.

Firstly, this review is about the product not the show itself.

All eight DVD packaged sets came wrapped in tight plastic together with a hard plastic band wrapped around them, and also individually wrapped with plastic inside that outer plastic. The first four seasons of DVDs (at least the ones I got) are in multiple thin DVD cases stored inside of a cardboard open casing; these cardboard cases are the ones that can be bent or slightly smashed. The latter four seasons of DVDs are in a single plastic case, much better and not bent or crushed at all. I don't think the larger cases are Amazon's fault, just the way the Criminal Minds DVDs were made.

All DVDs worked in my PlayStation 3, I could easily navigate the menus with my controller. One of the DVDs in season 4 or 5 had to be played "from the beginning" each time (open the Triangle menu hovering over the DVD on the PS3 home screen) otherwise it would only play the first episode on that DVD, and then the DVD menu afterwards would be unresponsive. Otherwise, no problems!

I got this DVD set while it was 50% off, but if you love Criminal Minds you're still going to want to consider this deal. Wheels up in 30!
